s2.title: API Docs for &XercesCName;
s2.p: &XercesCName; is packaged with the API documentation for SAX and DOM, the two most common programming interfaces for XML. The most common framework classes have also been documented.
&XercesCName; SAX is an implementation of the SAX 1.0/2.0 specification.
&XercesCName; DOM is an implementation of the

ul.li: DOM Level 1 Specification, a W3C Recommendation of October 1, 1998
DOM Level 2 Core Specification, a W3C Recommendation of November 13, 2000
DOM Level 2 Traversal and Range Specification, a W3C Recommendation of November 13, 2000

Contains a partial implementation of the
DOM Level 3.0 Core Specification, and
DOM Level 3.0 Abstract Schemas and Load and Save Specification (W3C Working Draft of 09 April 2002). This implementation is experimental. See DOM Level 3 Support for details.

s2.p: For a complete understanding of how the &XercesCName; APIs work, we recommend you to read these documents.
See the &XercesCName; API documentation for more details.
